text:
Listen close cause/ This isn't Langston's/ Drowsy tune./

It belongs to someone else,/ Someone tilted, jaunty, rumbling up./

The nighttime booms./

Streets borne from/ Plastic bucket beats/ Escape the muni stairs/ To sprawl around./

Steady noise/ Baselines/ A chorus./

Frantic noise/ Revels/ In weed whispers,/ Vomit and sewer steam./

Market trades in close injections,/

Deals drunken human laughter/ For a couple earnest/ Sermons./

It's all music/ It's all a mix/ It's all amuck/ With reluctant/ Joy./
